title: You wanna talk about tank end game fantasies
body: I NEED MY ATMA'S BACK I MISS MY BABY DARLING GIVING ME 120 AD SUPER LATE GAME WHEN I'M SION

replies.body: I for one want the tank fantasy where we can face off against an adc for more than 4 seconds. Like in the Graves nautilus fight.
just remove the crit pls. 12% chance to crit was so awkward.
